UN Statistics Division RDF API
==============================

This python module contains some classifications and standards
that come from the `UN Statistics Division`_ developed by the
`Open Knowledge Foundation`_ largely for use with the
`Where Does My Money Go?`_ project.

**Disclaimer:** this software is neither produced by nor endorsed
by any UN agency.

.. _UN Statistics Division: http://unstats.un.org/
.. _Open Knowledge Foundation: http://okfn.org/
.. _Where Does My Money Go?: http://www.wheredoesmymoneygo.org/

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   api_docs.rst
